title: How many times did I listen to a song on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, There is a way to see howmuch you listened to a song on Spotify. First you have to make an account on Last.fm, it’s a site where you can check much statistics about what you listen, and the site recommends music you maybe like to. When you signed in, you have to go on the bottom of the page to: Download Scrobbler, there you can login with your spotify account. When you logged in, Last.fm | Play music, find songs, and discover artists counts every single play you do on spotify, you can see howmuch you listen to a song, artist or album and they give you good recommendations about new underrated music what fits to the music you listen often. I hope this will help you :)
